name: Slimy Garden
description:
Your garden is infested with evil slimes. Defend it as long as you can by clearing the area and planting new magical plants.

This is a very small project developed for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 over a time span of 8 hours.

The Game Jam: (theme: "An End is a new Beginnig")

https://itch.io/jam/brackeys-9

===========================================================

Dev note: Also don't let the watering can confuse you, i sadly could not finish this mechanic in time. Even though this is only a very very small and poorly designed project, Comments are always very welcome. <3

- miichii
